mapper.insert: insert into message (name, content, status, create_time, update_time, version) values (#{name}, #{content}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{version})
mapper.update: update message set name = #{name}, content = #{content}, status = #{status}, update_time = #{updateTime}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from message where id in(#{id})
